title: Last project ever
description: Launch of a special interest game site for female users who are offered a weekly subscription and discounted game downloads

bids.iterations: I will complete the project from interuser messaging to databasing and finally the deployment on GAE in a week

iterations: This iteration deals with building a simple login function that will route the user to the appropriate professional/trial user page.
develop a function for users to send messages to one another and store them in a database

implement database and bring the application to life
